name: KTControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on name”
”Alexa, turn off name”
”Alexa, set the name to 40 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Kangtai KTControl skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Kangtai WiFi socket , RF switches and dimmers by voice. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your Kangtai KT Smart WiFi account and discover your device(s). the Kangtai KT Smart WiFi application you can get from App Store or Google play.

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which device to use. There are two ways to define this/these name(s):
* Use the name(s) you set up already – these are shown in the Kangtai KT Smart WiFi and can be changed, or
* Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group.
